name: Virtual Machine Undo Drive File
summary: Learn about .VUD files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: VUD files enable you to "discard undo disks," which deletes the changes made to the virtual hard drive and reverts to the last loaded VHD file. You can also "commit undo disks," which permanently commits the changes made to the existing VHD file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
